backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles and creation records with permission checks using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing affected frontend files and components for gallery usability filter and URL persistence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes including usableOnly search validation and wraps app with ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer showing caffeine.ai attribution and current year.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with logo, navigation links, and login button using router state.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout rendering header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting user for name during profile setup with save handling.
frontend/src/components/Auth/RequireAuth: Guard component requiring authentication and showing login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/Export: Provides UI controls to export individual PBR maps as PNG/JPG or download all maps as a ZIP, with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/Genera: UI for selecting generation parameters like category, seed, variation, creative freedom, and description before triggering a texture generation.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/MapSet: Displays a grid preview of all generated PBR maps with labels and color indicators.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/Previe: Two-option tab selector for switching between 2D map preview and 3D preview modes.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/Refere: Allows uploading, validating, previewing, and removing reference images used for generation.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/RunCom: Summarizes a generation run’s description, reference images, and creative freedom settings in a structured breakdown.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/RunMet: Shows metadata for a generation run including ID, timestamp, category, seed, resolution, and creative freedom status.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/SaveCr: Dialog for saving a creation to the user’s gallery, including title input, usability confirmation, thumbnail generation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Workspace/Tiling: Renders a 3D preview of tileable PBR maps using react-three-fiber with adjustable repeat and lighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps common backend queries and mutations for user profiles and creation records using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/creationRecords/setting: Generates a compact human‑readable settings string for a generation run.
frontend/src/lib/creationRecords/thumbna: Creates a resized JPEG thumbnail from an image data URL using canvas.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportMaps.ts: Converts and downloads PBR map images individually, supporting PNG/JPG export.
frontend/src/lib/generation/creativeFree: Applies Creative Freedom-B randomness parameters to modify seeds for generation.
frontend/src/lib/generation/generateTile: Generates tileable PBR texture maps using seeded noise and creative freedom settings.
frontend/src/lib/references/referenceVal: Validates reference images by file type and size (max 10MB).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CreationDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a selected gallery creation, including metadata, preview image, and navigation back to the gallery.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a grid of saved creations with filtering, loading states, and navigation into individual detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/WorkspacePage.tsx: Provides the main texture generation workspace with controls, previews, reference images, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/types/generation.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for PBR map sets, generation runs, reference images, and generation settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, features, and architectural notes for a 4K tileable PBR texture generator. Includes metadata, existing features, and guidelines for persistence behavior.
